knimeNode.name: Pareto Ranking
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node performs multi-objective Pareto ranking.

fullDescription.intro: The Pareto ranking is nicely described on Wikipedia, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pareto_optimality
fullDescription.option: List of all columns which may be used for ranking. Only numeric column are supported currently.
The columns you have selected to use for ranking.

ports.inPort: A data table with at least one numeric column.
ports.outPort: The input table with "Pareto Rank" column appended at the end.
